text: Frederick "Curly" Neal (May 19, 1942 â€“ March 26, 2020) was an American basketball player. He played with the Harlem Globetrotters from 1963 to 1985. Neal became the Trotters' featured ballhandler, a key role in the team's act. Neal was born in Greensboro, North Carolina. On March 26, 2020, Neal died at his home outside Houston, Texas at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Fred "Curly" Neal at the Harlem Globetrotters site Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Point guards Category:Sportspeople from Greensboro, North Carolina
title: Curly Neal
